"The Ultimate Picture Frame" - Create a customizable frame that can be adjusted to fit any size and shape of picture, with a sleek and modern design that complements any home decor.
"The Digital Picture Frame" - Develop a frame that can display photos from your phone or computer, with features like rotating images and adjustable brightness and contrast.
"The Collage Picture Frame" - Create a frame that allows you to display multiple photos in one, with adjustable spaces between each photo to create a unique and personalized collage.
"The Mirror Picture Frame" - Design a frame that doubles as a mirror, allowing you to see yourself and your surroundings while also displaying your favorite photos.
"The Interactive Picture Frame" - Create a frame that allows you to interact with your photos, with features like voice commands, touch controls, and augmented reality.
